title: internet guide for dummies

replies.body: We got a full guide at school on cyber bullying, social networking, viruses ect etc. Not much I learned just told us to make sure we have our security settings on, not to click on any links from people we don't trust and report bullys. nothing that most of us didn't know.
replies.body_tagged: We got a full guide at school on cyber bullying, social networking, viruses ect etc. Not much I learned just told us to make sure we have our security settings on, not to click on any links from people we don't trust and report bullys. nothing that most of us didn't know.

replies.body: This was most definately filmed in the late 90's.. But the internet was very new then.
